description.name: linkerc20
description.tagline: ChainLink Token erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-link Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept ChainLink Token erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/link receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/link wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
